DOC.brief_title: Phase III Randomized Study Interferon Gamma Children With Severe , Congenital Osteopetrosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo control , open label study . Patients randomize one two arm ( interferon gamma combination calcitriol calcitriol alone ) . Arm I : Patients receive calcitriol daily . Interferon gamma administer subcutaneous injection three time week . Arm II : Patients receive calcitriol daily . Patients may continue treatment absence toxicity disease progression . If disease progression diagnose control group , patient receive interferon gamma combination calcitriol . Patients follow every 4 week .
